price: 19. (Se les dirá:) “Coman y beban alegremente como recompensa por lo que hicieron”.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
